author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Private emails reveal how Trump's far-right lawyer ended up on a government election commission

sentence: Governors Race: Brian Kemp scored a landslide victory over David Perdue, delivering Mr. Trump his biggest setback of the 2022 primaries.
title: Lawyer who plotted to overturn Trumps 2020 loss recruits election deniers to watch over the vote.
